title: Scholarships
content: Is DAC, MRD anol for full cgpa or for sem gpa only ?

comments.body: These are provided every semester (except the 8th semester if I am not wrong), based on that semester's SGPA.
Any idea how long after the result they'll release the eligibility list (approx)?
Only comes out halfway through the next semester. These lists are released only after all re-evaluations are done, and these take weeks.

Mostly yes for the top x% of the batch. Usually branch toppers tend to have 9.5+
